programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: Cha's Family

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: <Dear X> follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: A U.S. Customs official uncovers a money laundering scheme involving Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.

programme.title: The First Vampire
programme.desc: Vietnam's first ever vampire movie. In a modern fantasy world, five young women gather to compete for a life-changing opportunity, unaware of a bloodthirsty plan that awaits them.

programme.title: Bleeding Heart
programme.desc: A yoga instructor looks to protect her sex-worker sister from her deadbeat boyfriend.

programme.title: Trouble
programme.desc: A pampered dog named Trouble must learn to live in the real world while trying to escape from his former owner's greedy children and must learn how to survive on the big-city streets.

programme.title: Beautiful Disaster
programme.desc: College freshman Abby tries to distance herself from her dark past while resisting her attraction to bad boy Travis.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel

programme.title: Security
programme.desc: A security guard protects an eleven year-old girl who is being targeted by a gang for participating as a trial witness.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: We explore the integral role that older animals play in their communities and investigate how animals learn over the course of their lives.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Human, plant, animal, bacteria, all have one inevitable thing in common; death. In this episode we discover the ways in which aging animals defy our usual understanding of the circle of life.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: In this episode we meet some animal elders who help us understand the psychological mechanisms associated with long life and the positive social value long-lived animals bring to their communities.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: Meet some late-life lovers and explore the reasons behind their sexual longevity and their ability to reproduce well into their later years.

programme.title: Aging In The Wild
programme.desc: What does it take to maintain alpha status as animals grow older? We investigate the responsibilities and challenges that come with being a senior leader of a pack.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson joins the US Marines' 'Heavy Haulers' squadron as they're put to the test. They battle to keep their fleet of CH53 'Super Stallion' choppers flying, in preparation for intense warfare training exercises in the desert and mountains.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes on a cross-country road trip to help the Well Done Foundation. They work to find and cap some of the estimated two million leaking, toxic - potentially deadly abandoned oil and gas wells that are scattered throughout the U.S.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson embeds with the team of one of the most extreme, avalanche-prone mountain ski mountains in the world - Snowbird. They battle to keep the steep and deep slopes safe with shovels, snowcats and even a WWII Howitzer cannon.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: Mike Davidson goes to the biggest automated package sorting facility in the world - UPS Worldport in Louisville, Kentucky. Two million packages go through here every day, and it's up to the hardhat heroes behind the scenes to make it all happen.

programme.title: How Did They Fix That? S2
programme.desc: In Philadelphia, Mike Davidson is on streets, in tunnels, on tracks and in trolley restoration garages - working shoulder-to-shoulder with the team that keeps one of America's largest and oldest mass transit systems running smoothly and on time.

programme.title: Aerial Africa
programme.desc: Soar over vast deserts, enormous diamonds, and the world's largest inland oasis.

programme.title: Aerial Africa
programme.desc: Explore the Western Cape's stunning shorelines, dramatic mountains, and richly-diverse metropolis, from thousands of feet in the air.

programme.title: Aerial Africa
programme.desc: Observe a land filled with geological phenomena whose majesty can only truly be appreciated from the sky. From forgotten shipwrecks strewn along the coastline to the unexplained fairy circles in Koakoveld, Namibia's secrets will be revealed.

programme.title: Aerial Africa
programme.desc: Soar over the richly diverse, African nation of Zambia. Including cities crafted by the world's richest men and markets teeming with some of the world's poorest people.

programme.title: Air Warriors S11
programme.desc: This documentary series shows five generations of jet engines. These fighter jets are capable of carrying bombs and soar close to the edge of space. The sixth generation of fighter jets began in 2020, and the 11th season has covered most of the air artillery since then.

programme.title: The Rhino Orphanage

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episode, we witness a desperate mission to save a spooked impala. The intelligence of these anti poaching elephants astounds everyone. And, there is always time for fun tasks.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters
programme.desc: In this episoden the volunteers experience close up encounters with iconic creatures. Immersion into Imire’s anti-poaching efforts. And, nothing stands in the way of hard work.

programme.title: Wild Warrior Encounters

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live.

programme.title: Talk Africa
programme.desc: Talk Africa is a weekly discussion show that brings the most influential voices in Africa to the world.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues.

programme.title: Biz Talk

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home – until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they’ve made over the kids’ rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they’re the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he’s missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer’s water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods
programme.desc: When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Dinotrux Supercharged
programme.desc: When Ty and the gang sift through the destruction left by the Dreadtrux they discover that it changed the crater in surprising ways by unleashing a huge cache of supercharger bit bugs

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him “he just had to be there,” but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free
programme.desc: Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender
programme.desc: On their way back to reconvene with the Atlas, the Lions are ambushed by a mysterious masked figure while the Atlas races to rescue them.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: In order to get a ticket to a Manga convention she desperately wants, Birch agrees to write a series of Manga strips featuring Liam as a suave, cool and heroic character. When Birch finally gets a chance to sit down and talk to her hero, he turns out to be a jerk.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: When Raffi joins Amelia's rock band, Birch follows on his heels as the band's manager. Soon she's writing songs that pit her and Raffi against their podmates. Pod 4's true colors are revealed once Birch realizes she's gone too far.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Liam's role as romance advisor to the boys of Cosmos High gets under Birch's skin. Offended that Liam thinks female behaviour is nothing more than a collection of symbols, Birch watches as Liam misinterprets Sandra's signals and ends up with pie on his face.

programme.title: My Life Me
programme.desc: Birch runs for school president because she wants to see changes to the Art program at Cosmos High. On a whim, Liam gets involved and soon his goofy antics are winning him favours. Before long, it's an all-out game of one-upmanship between the two cousins

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi wants to repaint her kitchen but Poppy has run out of paint. Can anybody else come up with an idea to brighten up her walls?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: The twins are playing hide and seek with Pip but they all argue over who is the best at hiding? Can they make up their differences and play nicely together?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi and Pip are busy making pancakes. But every time they flip one it disappears, where could they be going?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Pip wants a pony. He tries adapting his scooter and Violet even makes him a hobby horse. But nothing is quite right. Until Fifi points out the silver horse made out of stars in the night sky.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: All the tots are excited as Aunt Tulip is holding a Caribbean themed carnival. But will the weather hold long enough for them to have their celebrations?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: It is a windy day in the garden, Fifi's washing has blown away. Poppy offers to find it, but she gets caught in the storm. The other tots set out to find her and spend a wild night out in the open.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo's cousin Hornetto pays a visit to the garden and quickly charms all the tots. Stingo and Slugsy decide he must be stopped from staying permanently at all costs!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Stingo is very depressed. All the tots have noticed it. They decide to organise a very special "wasp" surprise for Stingo.

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Grandma is coming to visit, and Olivia couldn't be more excited. She's less excited, however, about having to give up her bedroom and bunk with Ian. But when Grandma invites Olivia to share her room for a sleepover, Olivia finds out that rooming with her snoring grandmother isn't as much fun as she thought!

programme.title: Olivia
programme.desc: Olivia is thrilled to be invited to Francine's for dinner, until she learns that she must reciprocate with an invitation. She worries that Francine will be unimpressed by her family's casual table manners. But after dinner at Francine's proves not to be much fun, Olivia appreciates her own lively family dinners.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: When the other dragons come down with the flu, Summer must overcome her fear of eels to retrieve the cure and get her friends back in the air.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When Erica makes fun of George and Harold’s latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Tony races against Shashi and Layla through a Northern California ghost town, but Shashi and Layla are using the race as a cover for a heist on a billionaire’s train. Tony and his team are introduced to the other cool SH1FT3R racers, and while they can’t stop the heist without blowing their cover, they do manage to get a tracker on the train car Shashi and Layla stole.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Shashi sends Tony and Layla to steal weapons codes from a Russian oligarch, while Margaret “Echo” Pearl, Cisco and Frostee use Shashi’s absence to sneak into Shashi’s Cliffside mansion to investigate. Ms. Nowhere tells the team to look for the “keys” in Shashi’s mansion, but all they find are a couple of awesome super-cars.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control"… or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Shashi sends Tony and Layla to steal weapons codes from a Russian oligarch, while Margaret “Echo” Pearl, Cisco and Frostee use Shashi’s absence to sneak into Shashi’s Cliffside mansion to investigate. Ms. Nowhere tells the team to look for the “keys” in Shashi’s mansion, but all they find are a couple of awesome super-cars.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Shashi stages a race up the privately-owned Mount Zebulon, and he invites Tony, Cisco, and Margaret “Echo” Pearl to participate. The crew soon discovers that Shashi is using the race to steal another super-car (this time from space!) – and he knows that Tony is working with the feds.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: Ms. Nowhere tells the kids that the failed mission is over, but Tony isn’t ready to give up, and he’s determined to rescue Frostee. The crew goes rogue by deciding to steal the final key from Shashi and trade it for their friend.

But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City

Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Accused S2
programme.desc: Based on the BBC's BAFTA-winning crime anthology, Accused opens in a courtroom on the accused, with viewers knowing nothing about their crime or how they ended up on trial. Told from the defendant's point of view through flashbacks, this series holds a mirror up to the current times with evocative and emotional stories. In Accused, viewers discover how an ordinary person gets caught up in an extraordinary situation, ultimately revealing how one wrong turn leads to another, until it's too late to turn back.

programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. programme.title: The Fight Machine
programme.desc: Two young Canadians from starkly different worlds are each trapped in a life beyond his control. When they are pulled into the unforgiving underground bare knuckle fight circuit, their collision sparks a brutal journey of vengeance, retribution and self discovery.

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his family’s massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Blood Hunters: Rise of the Hybri
programme.desc: Gabriella is driven by vengeance after a hybrid monster slaughters her family. On her quest, she joins a squad of Blood Hunters and together they wage war against ruthless underworld warlords, igniting a brutal showdown.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Special Forces agent Brenner and her husband stumble upon an illegal drug compound in the woods while hiking. The drug dealers capture them, kill her husband, and leave her for dead. Not only does Brenner escape alive, she is also seething with rage and vows to hunt down all who murdered her husband and take revenge!

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join award-winning Malaysian actress Siti Saleha and her husband as they explore the city by day and venture into the night, discovering its vibrant culture and hidden treasures.

programme.title: The Plot To Kill My Mother
programme.desc: A young woman who unknowingly grew up in federal witness protection reels after her mother's murder, leading her to question everything. She decides to leave the program and find the killer.

programme.title: Betrayed By Love
programme.desc: Riley March's near-perfect life comes to a sudden halt when a car accident takes her life, leaving behind a family without a mother. As the investigation commences, the case takes a strange turn.

programme.title: Mommy Meanest
programme.desc: Madelyn and her daughter Mia have always had a tight bond. But when Mia starts spending more time with her boyfriend and is about to leave for college, Madelyn is panicked by her emerging independence.

programme.title: To Kill A Stepfather
programme.desc: Nicole learns that her stepfather suffered a deadly fall down the stairs and her mother has been arrested for his murder. As Nicole begins investigating, she learns that everything is not as it seems.

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Holidays
programme.desc: Rachael shows how to prepare a meat-free holiday meal that everyone will love! First, she makes a flavourful soup using Italian pumpkins. Next, she prepares her family's traditional "Holiday Stars".

programme.title: Rachael Ray's Holidays
programme.desc: Inspired by her friend Brian, Rachael shows how to make her version of a beef and chorizo chilli with queso that is the perfect meal for a holiday crowd, a big-match night or a family dinner.

programme.title: Got To Leave Something
programme.desc: They meet the finest biker of Jiri Mountain, a poet who fled city life to live in the mountains. From this poet, who captures photos of stars and flowers, the two actors learn poetry.

programme.title: All Fixed Up In An Empty Village (S3)
programme.desc: Despite the intense summer heat, Na-rae brings a crowd to Palbok-dong while loudly promoting the area. But of cours, things don’t go as planned. The team changes plans and heads to Deokjin Park instead.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy visits two restaurants that thrive on recipes handed down through generations. First, he heads to Mamoun's Falafel, then off to Nashville to visit Silver Sands Cafe.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Breaking Out
programme.desc: Tierra is a musician with massive bumps on her ears that hold her back from performing. Dr. Zoe assists Dr. Lee in helping Ryan, whose numerous head bumps undermine his life journey.

programme.title: To Kill A Stepfather
programme.desc: Nicole learns that her stepfather suffered a deadly fall down the stairs and her mother has been arrested for his murder. As Nicole begins investigating, she learns that everything is not as it seems.

programme.title: Lonely Crime Fanatic
programme.desc: Romance sparks when a lonely true crime fan meets her favourite podcast host, but things soon turn strange and his newest run of episodes appear to revolve around her eventual murder.

programme.title: Ppang Car Road 2
programme.desc: From Seoul to Busan, this spectacular eating show takes place at famous bakeries/patisseries to give the dessert lovers the glimpse of tasty goodness of some of the most-coveted desserts of all.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping (S6)
programme.desc: A zombie in an upscale neighborhood appears welcoming from the outside, but years of water damage, black growth, and a battered roof, will really put Dolmar, Keisha and Amanda to the test.

programme.title: All Fixed Up In An Empty Village (S3)
programme.desc: After the chaos, afternoon business begins—only to be met with an unexpected torrential downpour in Palbok-dong. Min-seok's team, the most vulnerable to the rain, faces an emergency.

programme.title: Earth Sweepers
programme.desc: At the first stop, Ulaan Chuluut landfill, 'Trash Uncle' Kim Seok-hoon is back in action, diving into cleanup mode. But he finds something shocking that leaves him furious. What happened at the landfill?

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: Buddy travels coast-to-coast to visit two legendary ladies who built their empires from the ground up. First, Buddy's in Harlem, New York to visit the "Queen of Soul Food's'' famous restaurant, Sylvia's.

programme.title: Legends Of The Fork
programme.desc: We're turning up the heat! Buddy visits two iconic hotspots who are famous for their intensely spicy dishes. First, he heads to Jitlada to see if he can withstand the heat of their Thai Jungle Curry.

programme.title: Million Dollar Zombie Flips
programme.desc: James takes on a dying home in need of a major facelift: a 104-year-old house brought to him by a rookie flipper. With the property in dire condition, James and his team must rethink the layout.

programme.title: Million Dollar Zombie Flips
programme.desc: James and his team partner with brother-sister newbie flippers Blake and Abby on a risky zombie house project. James funds the renovation, while the siblings manage the contractors and oversee the work.

programme.title: Million Dollar Zombie Flips
programme.desc: James and his team connect with Tyler, an aspiring flipper with a lead on a zombie house. But entrusting such a big job to a partner with little experience makes them question whether he can do it.

programme.title: The Neighbor Who Saw Too Much
programme.desc: A grounded teen becomes convinced that her hot new neighbour is actually a dangerous killer. When no-one else believes her, she takes matters into her own hands.

programme.title: Nightmare School Moms
programme.desc: Two mothers battle to see which of their overachieving daughters will be accepted to a prestigious university, but when one of their methods quickly spiral out of control, the games become deadly.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: The American frontier is rich with legends of Native Americans and outlaws, but also eerie tales of cursed mountains, monsters, and UFOs. Could these tales be true? Is the Wild West stranger than we think?

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11)
programme.desc: While a trip to Europe continues to uncover clues connecting the Templars to Scandinavian culture and Oak Island, on Oak Island, a clue found beneath a Nolan's Cross boulder may offer the missing answers.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S3)
programme.desc: Two chance discoveries in the 1950s turn mundane industrial materials into legendary toys. Etch A Sketch and Play-Doh will rake in billions for decades to come, but not everyone will reap the rewards.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: The Founding Fathers established the pillars of freedom and democracy. New information has emerged about the secrets of these important historical figures. What truths have remained in the shadows?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The ancient Greeks built an empire that is considered the birthplace of Western Civilisation, and they credited their most monumental achievements to gods like Zeus, Apollo, and Poseidon.

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: Buckle up as we take you on a wild journey into the world of vintage daredevils who risked it all for a rush. From the enigmatic Human Fly to skateboard speed demons, these stunts were unforgettable.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: A cartoon studio creates one of the most recognisable characters in the world. Mickey Mouse begins as a pencil sketch, and through a journey of failure, innovation, and guts becomes an American icon.

programme.desc: Rapper-comedian Andrew E and the kids from the hit TV series TGIS combined together in this merry mix-up about poor boys falling in love with rich girls, who were guarded by a very strict maiden aunt.

programme.title: Ober Da Bakod The Movie
programme.desc: The movie version of the popular TV sitcom, Ober De Bakod. This is a story of two families, always in competition -- they are actually neighbors. In this movie, the parents continue to fight and outdo each other, while the children continue their love affairs with each other. However, this time, they all go on holiday -- separately of course. It does not start well, as they all ended up in an island where they meet the natives and have problems with the bad guys.

programme.title: Barumbado

programme.title: Sugo

programme.title: Cuadro De Jack
programme.desc: Young comedians Nino, Keempee, Dennis and Smokey starred in this 90's remake of a blockbuster hit. The Filipino version of the cowboy and Indians war made all the more appealing by the laugh-filled sequences featuring the inept, but trying hard bunch of heroes.

programme.title: The Untouchable Family

programme.title: Working Girls 2 (Digitally Enhanced)

programme.title: Abot Hanggang Sukdulan
programme.desc: The abduction and rape of the eldest daughter shattered the once happy Paredes household. They vowed to get justice for their daughter but changed their plan when Romano offered marriage after it was discovered that Agnes was pregnant.

programme.desc: A librarian's husband turn out to be psychotically abusive. When the husband mistakenly thinks he has killed her, he dumps her in a river. In need of help to take revenge, she hooks up with a bank robber and together they kill him.

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Academy Award nominees Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou join Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly in this action drama from Ed Zwick, the filmmaker behind The Last Samurai. DiCaprio stars as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war; Hounsou (Gladiator), as a desperate father searching for his lost son; and Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), as a reporter searching for the truth behind the trade in 'conflict diamonds.' Forced to confront the brutal human cost of the diamond trade, Archer changes his search for financial reward to a quest for redemption.

programme.title: He's Just Not That Into You
programme.desc: A group of interconnected Baltimore-based twenty and thirtysomethings navigate their various relationships from the shallow end of the dating pool through the deep murky waters of married life trying to read the signs of the opposite sex - and hoping to be the exceptions to the no-exceptions rule. Gigi just wants a man who says he'll call - and does - while Alex advises her to stop sitting by the phone. Beth wonders if she should call it off after years of committed singlehood with her boyfriend Neil but he doesn't think there's a single thing wrong with their unmarried life. Janine's not sure if she can trust her husband Ben who can't quite trust himself around Anna. Anna can't decide between the sexy married guy or her straightforward no-sparks standby Conor who can't get over the fact that he can't have her. And Mary who's found an entire network of loving supportive men just needs to find one who's straight.

programme.title: French Connections
programme.desc: French Connections revolves around France, its top stories and news, its experience in various spheres and cultural life, sport events, health care and education, cuisine and so much more. Find out what is like to live in France, get to know its regions, and feel the true taste of France.

programme.desc: The Observers on France 24 is a weekly show produced with photos, videos and personal accounts from Observers around the world. Top international current affairs are covered by using eyewitness accounts from Observers- people who are at the heart of an event. They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris. The Observers are volunteers, and are not paid for their contributions.

programme.title: WIFI
programme.desc: Li Hong Shan’s wife died in a car accident. One year later, he suddenly receives a message from his dead wife. Li vows to save his wife's life through this time transcending WIFI signal, but ends up uncovering a bigger conspiracy behind…

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Rooftop
programme.desc: A group of friends invites Paul to a secret party on their campus rooftop. When a prank accidentally kills Paul, the friends cover up the incident and promised never to disclose it. Paul vows to take revenge by becoming a vicious ghost to haunt them into taking responsibility for their actions.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Model Family
programme.desc: A single-parent family (Yu Xiang and Tong Tong) moves into a new neighbourhood where everyone’s life seems perfect. However, while things may look rosy on the outside, dark secrets and horror raid each family from the inside, and nothing really are as they seem.

programme.title: Detective Dee: The Ghosts in Weird Town
programme.desc: Detective Dee investigates a series of terrifying vampire transformations in Youming Town, uncovering a sinister conspiracy masterminded by Prince Li Zhen, who plots to overthrow the empire. Armed with courage and ingenuity, Dee defeats the bloodthirsty vampires and ultimately exposes the prince’s dark ambitions.

programme.title: IBLIS
programme.desc: A husband buys a new house for his wife, hoping to reconcile their marriage. When they move in however, the couple starts to experience some terrifying incidents, including the presence of a horrifying creature in the house…

programme.title: Bad Blood
programme.desc: A social worker takes a withdrawn homeless boy into her care, not suspecting that he is a vampire. As she gets closer to him, his thirst for human blood increases and to protect him, she must help lure his next kill to satisfy his cravings.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: A young girl encounters a novelist in a bar and quickly falls in love with him. However, it turns out she has fallen into a trap set up by the novelist and his ex-girlfriend who is a ghost with a disfigured face. The journey of revenge and ultimate terror has just begun!

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When beautiful Jalajhia Finklea vanished the day before her 18th birthday, her Wampanoag Tribe members immediately took action.

programme.title: City Confidential (S9)
programme.desc: The quiet suburb of Haddon Township is turned upside down when a toddler goes missing. Residents band together to search local streets and help detectives reveal an unlikely murderer.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: An argument between former NFL player Travis Rudolph and his ex-girlfriend escalates into a gunfight with her brother and his friends.

programme.title: The First 48 (S24)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, a young mother is gunned down at a convenience store by a shotgun-toting assailant. In Kansas City, a local businessman is executed and Detective Jason Sutton looks to his employees for a motive.

programme.title: Murder In The 21st
programme.desc: Police are hard-pressed to find solid leads when a 19-year-old girl vanishes without a trace.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In (S1)
programme.desc: A man is arrested for driving his golf cart while intoxicated and refuses a breathalyser test. A young man with LSD and hashish learns the hard way that hanging with underage girls is a very bad idea.

programme.title: First Blood (S1)
programme.desc: Arthur Shawcross tells a lot of stories about his life before he began to kill. He might have been known for killing women along Rochester's Genesee River, but his first murder was years earlier.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A grieving uncle screams at his sister-in-law in court over his missing nephew; an autoworker checks in to his virtual hearing from the assembly line; a road rage killer blames his victim; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S5)
programme.desc: A grieving father attacks his 3-year-old son's killer in court; a judge screams expletives at a disruptive member of the gallery; a wheelchair-ridden defendant runs for it before entering court; and more.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S15)
programme.desc: Tulsa detectives believe the victim of a shooting was a Good Samaritan who'd been robbed. But at trial, the jury must decide if his killer actually acted in fear of his own life.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Savannah and Trent Paschal seem like the perfect suburban couple — madly in love. But when Savannah finds her calling as a funeral director, their romance ends in suspicion, and a countrywide police hunt.

programme.title: Homicide Squad New Orleans (S2)
programme.desc: Nick Davis investigates a local artist found murdered in his home. With very little evidence, Detective Davis methodically pursues every lead until a lucky break points him toward a surprise suspect.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: An angry confrontation leads to a 31-year-old father facing life behind bars after shooting his ex-girlfriend's boyfriend in the leg. He insists he was defending his ex and their child from an intruder.

programme.title: Lie Detector: Truth Or Deception
programme.desc: Raven Abaroa puts it all on the line for a polygraph test with former FBI agent George Olivo to show once and for all he did not murder his wife, Janet.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: After a storm hits Warwick Cove, RI, a boat dragging its anchor appears in the harbour with a decomposed corpse onboard. Pathologist Dr. Priya Banerjee must identify the John Doe and determine how he died.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S3)
programme.desc: A Kentucky community is rocked to its core when a prominent family is gunned down in their home after Sunday church service. The sole survivor of the attack claims he killed an intruder in self-defence.

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6)
programme.desc: Dubbed 'the vampire killer,' teen Mathew Hardman thought that taking a life would make him immortal. His victim was an elderly neighbour. After stabbing her, he removed her heart and drank her blood.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2)
programme.desc: When mother of two, Deanna Cook, missed her daily call to her mom, her family began to worry Deanna's 'stalker' might be involved. After texting and calling Deanna, her family called 911.

programme.desc: Know more about the volcanoes found in the Philippines, the factors that affect climate, the effects of changing climate, and how to adapt accordingly. Discover the relationship between the constellations in the sky and Earth's position along its orbit.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn about the natural and physical environment and one’s culture and heritage

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: Learn about the concept of size, length, weight, time, and money. Study how children can take care of themselves and understand the objects in the environment and their attributes.

programme.title: Grade 1 Language
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang konsepto ng pagbabaybay, panghalip, pangngalan, salitang naglalarawan, at ang pagtukoy ng sariling ideya at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggang kuwento.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about fractions 1⁄2 and 1/4, 2-dimensional and 3-dimensional figures, as well as continuous and repeating patterns and mathematical sentences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy
programme.desc: Learn about polite expressions and how to talk about oneself, one’s family and one’s personal experiences.

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa
programme.desc: Unawain ang kahalagahan ng pagkilala ng mga batayang impormasyon ng pisikal na kapaligiran sa sariling paaralan at ng mga taong bumubuo rito para sa paghubog ng kakayahan ng bawat mag-aaral.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, salitang magkatugma, salitang naglalarawan, at pagbabaybay, pati na rin ang iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento at ang pag-uugnay ng sarili sa tekstong nabasa.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Study how to divide whole numbers up to 1000 including money and unit fractions. Learn more about straight and curved lines, flat and curved surfaces, and basic shapes and continuous patterns using two attributes.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Discover what are word clines, synonyms, and antonyms. Identify major points and key themes in a story, and the difference between what is made-up and real in texts.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang kahalagahan ng mabuting paglilingkod ng mga namumuno sa pagsulong ng mga pangunahing hanapbuhay at pagtugon sa pangangailangan ng mga kasapi ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang tambalang salita, pandiwa, pang-abay, at pang-ukol. Alamin kung paano magbigay ng sariling ideya, hinuha, pangunahin at sumusuportang kaisipan, tungkol sa kuwentong napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Identify which fractions are proper and improper, similar and dissimilar and equivalent. Learn more about lines and symmetrical designs, continuous and repeating patterns, and mathematical sentences involving multiplication and division of whole numbers.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Study what are homonyms, homographs, and hyponyms. Know more about the elements of a story, how to write it, and how to compare and contrast its information, alongside learning about words, phrases, and sentences with long vowels.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang pagkakakilanlang kultural ng kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Discover how objects perform motion, and learn about the source of light, sound, heat and electricity, along with their uses.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: Discover the key concepts of parallelograms and triangle similarity.

programme.title: Grade 9 English

programme.title: La Place D'Une Autre
programme.desc: Nelie rose out of poverty by becoming a nurse on the front line in 1914. During the war, she saw her friend Rose die, who was going to be hired as a reader to a bourgeois widow. Nelie assumed her identity and became Rose. In the hope that no one would discover her secret.

programme.title: Pachyderme
programme.desc: This year, as every year, Louise is left with her grandparents for a short holiday in the country. But this year turns out to be very different, it snows and a monster is about to die.

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, emilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Metiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Every four years, the best athletes in the animal kingdom gather at the Coubertin Fountain for their own version of the Winter Olympics. Fox, Sheep, She-Wolf, Mouse: they'll all be challenging one another in a series of sporting events in the hope of winning a medal.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Les Triples
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Le Refuge D'Audrey
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes
programme.desc: Dimitri, Raph's and Anaïs's uncle, is a French globetrotter who is fascinated by nature. He gives them tasks to stimulate their creativity. Thanks to Blox, a small robot, they access the ''world of the worlds'', a secret fantasy place where they can play and learn.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: Welcome to very Francophile Albania, where the French language has left its mark on history. First stop, Korca, the cradle of Albanian Francophonie, home to the French military cemetery and the first French high school founded in the Balkans. Then on to Gjirokastër, the stone city, and Berat, the city of a thousand windows.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Vivement Dimanche
programme.desc: On his iconic red sofa, Michel Drucker welcomes and shines the spotlight on the talent of yesterday, today and tomorrow. A main guest talks about their career, their projects and their origins...

programme.title: echappees Belles
programme.desc: With its mountainous relief in the east and desert in the west, Colorado is a mosaic of national parks. A playground for hikers, this land of mountains, deep red canyons, mesas, sandy dunes and crystal-clear lakes was first the site of many military conquests.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Wedded by force in Kabylia, Dalila came to Paris very young, forced to follow her husband. Between violence and financial hardship, she found the strength to free herself and try her hand at a traditionally male profession: taxi driver. She explains her struggle to take her future in hand again.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: While enjoying a thalasso stay offered by his colleagues, Commissioner Watson discovers a couple electrocuted in one of the jacuzzis.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: Investigators discover that the victims were not who they claimed to be, using multiple identities across the territory. Did the killer target the impostors or the impersonated?

programme.title: Version Francaise
programme.desc: In Bordeaux, the Musee des Douanes shines a spotlight on one of France's oldest institutions. Interview with Arnaud Faye, head of the Bristol restaurants. For the Diesel show, Glenn Martens transformed the catwalk into a graffiti area. Sheathing and gilding: the Bettenfeld-Rosenblum workshop has been working with leather since 1895.

programme.title: Envoye Special
programme.desc: In-depth reports, investigations, unseen interviews, detailed profiles, testimonies... The current affairs show that is always on the move, up close to events and all those involved!

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes
programme.desc: From Saint-Paul-de-Vence to the Roya Valley, in the hinterland of Nice, enthusiasts are fighting to promote their territory. By reviving an old perfume house or creating a high-end spirit with small spelt, these artisans are committed to preserving their precious heritage.

programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
